categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Flesh Raider Chieftain was a Flesh Raider who commanded several others of his species on their homeworld of Tython during the Flesh Raider uprising of 3643 BBY. A Flesh Raider with black eyes and dark grey skin, the Chieftain was assigned with subordinates to guard the deflector shield generator in the Tythos Ridge protecting the main Flesh Raider command base. However, the Chieftain and the soldiers were killed by the Padawan of Jedi Master Orgus Din when the apprentice raided the mountain caves to destroy the generator.
The Flesh Raider Chieftain appears in BioWare's massively multiplayer online roleplaying game, Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the Jedi Knight class quest "The Face of the Enemy".
